text: phalanges of the hand - Cardiomegaly - Carpal bone hypoplasia - Death in childhood - Deficiency of N-acetylglucosamine-1-phosphotransferase - Diastasis recti - Failure to thrive - Flared iliac wings - Flat acetabular roof - Heart murmur - High forehead - Hip dislocation - Hoarse voice - Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy - Hypoplasia of the odontoid process - Hypoplastic scapulae - Increased serum beta-hexosaminidase - Increased serum iduronate sulfatase activity - Inguinal hernia - Large sella turcic
